sentences.sContent: There are those who say he is Elias.
sentences.sCn: 还有人说他就是伊莱亚斯呢。

sentences.sContent: Elias Sory is the director general of health services in Ghana.
sentences.sCn: 伊莱亚斯·索瑞是加纳健康服务的处长。

sentences.sContent: President Elias Hrawi of Lebanon was at the White House at a tense moment in the Middle East.
sentences.sCn: 在中东局势紧张的时刻，黎巴嫩总统埃利亚斯·赫拉维正在白宫。
